alert.note: Alert for Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 24 at 12:44PM CST until further notice by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Northern and Central Victoria County. * WHEN...Until 345 PM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1239 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Multiple reports of water over roads on Farm Market roads and Frontage roads. West of the cities of Victoria and Nursery. - Additional rainfall on already saturated soils will quickly lead to water over roadways and minor flooding in low-lying areas. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Victoria, Victoria Mall, Victoria Detar Hospital North, Ball Airport Area, Victoria Colony Creek Country Club, Victoria Riverside Park, Victoria College, Brentwood Subdivision, Victoria Regional Airport, Nursery, Downtown Victoria, Salem, Telferner, Saxet Lakes, Fordtran, Mission Valley and Inez. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
